channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Rhapsody Design Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Rhapsody Design Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-1245|2024-09-17T00:41:34.248Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Software Architect Design Manager 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 124580.

item.title: CVE-2017-1462|2024-09-17T01:07:09.640Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 128461.

item.title: CVE-2017-1249|2024-09-17T01:01:34.539Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.
